trans-unit.source: Provides an exception for read-only <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsProperty"></xref> objects.

This exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsBase> class when attempting to change the value of a <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> that was marked as being read-only.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyIsReadOnlyException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyIsReadOnlyException"></xref> class based on a supplied parameter.
A string containing an exception message.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyIsReadOnlyException"></xref> class based on the supplied parameters.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the serialized stream.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyIsReadOnlyException"></xref> class based on supplied parameters.
A string containing an exception message.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
